turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hi, I would like to order a coffee from Starbucks located at George Street, New Brunswick New Jersey.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Sure, what type of coffee would you like?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Do they still have available the Gingerbread latte?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: No, sorry. The Gingerbread latte is not currently available at this Starbucks location.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Ok, I'll just order a Caramel Macchiato.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: What size would you like your Caramel Macchiato to be?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I would like a Venti.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Would you like to add sugar and whipped cream?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, I would like 3 Splenda, but no whipped cream.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: What type of milk would you like?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I would like skim milk please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Would you like vanilla flavored syrup with your coffee?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, please. I would also like it topped with caramel drizzle.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok, would you like anything else added to your order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No, that would be all.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Your order is a Venti Caramel Macchiato, 3 Splenda, no whipped cream, with skim milk, with vanilla flavored syrup and topped with a caramel drizzle.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Great, how much is my total.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Your total is $5.00. Your order will be ready to be picked up shortly at the Starbucks on George Street in New Brunswick, New Jersey. Your receipt will be sent to your mobile phone by text message.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Great, thank you very much. Good Bye.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok, Good Bye.
